articles.title: Cases of colorectal cancer on the rise among younger Americans - KARE11.com
articles.description: Twin Cities woman diagnosed at 34 years old shares her story
articles.content:
MINNEAPOLIS Bridgette O'Brien says the signs were subtle.
"It was the summer of 2019. I was having some minor pains and I ended up going to the doctor," she says. 
The timing also wasn't great.
